Identification.LongTitle: Annual Statement (Banks and Bank Holding Companies) Regulations

Provision.Text: His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to subsections 308(2)a, 840(2)b and 978(1)c of the Bank Actd, hereby makes the annexed Annual Statement (Banks and Bank Holding Companies) Regulations.

Section.Text: The prescribed statements referred to in subsections 308(2) and 840(2) of the Bank Act are

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a balance sheet as at the end of the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of income for the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of cash flows for the financial year;

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of changes in shareholders’ equity for the financial year; and

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a statement of comprehensive income for the financial year.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on June 1, 2011.
